name: Amelias Lulworth Cove
author: Andy Stevenson
metaDesc: A holiday home in beautiful Lulworth Village, England

house.title: Our House
house.summary: Set in beautiful Lulworth village within a stones throw of the Jurassic Coast.

house.title: The Garden
house.summary: Ideally situated with views of the coast. Perfect on summer evenings.

house.title: The Hallway
house.summary: Easy access to the beach, costal works or to local pubs and restaurants!

house.title: The Dining Room
house.summary: Spacious airy room to enjoy meals with the family.

house.title: The Living Room
house.summary: Chill out and relax, enjoy the views, watch the telly!

house.title: The Balcony
house.summary: Easy access to the beach, costal works or to local pubs and restaurants!

house.title: The Master Bedroom
house.summary: Relax in the second master bedroom with en-suite, read a book, stream movies, sleep!

house.title: The Family Bedroom
house.summary: Comfortable family bedroom for friends or the kids with outside courtyard area to chill out.

house.title: The Downstairs Bedroom
house.summary: Enjoy the country side views from your King Size four poster bed.

house.title: The Downstairs Bathroom
house.summary: A clean spacious bathroom, ensuite to the downstairs bedroom.

lulworth.title: Lulworth Village
lulworth.summary: Some of Dorset’s most visited landmarks are found in Lulworth and it is also part of the Jurassic Coast World Heritage Site.

lulworth.title: Lulworth Castle
lulworth.summary: The castle is an early 17th-century Elizabethan hunting lodge erected in the style of a revival fortified castle. The parks and surrounding grounds are stunning.

lulworth.title: Pubs & Cafés
lulworth.summary: Lulworth is blessed with excellent gastro pubs & cafés.

lulworth.title: Lulworth Beaches
lulworth.summary: Lulworth is blessed with some of the finest beaches in England.

lulworth.title: The Cove
lulworth.summary: Popular at any time of year. Lulworth Cove is a world reknowned highlight of the Jurassic Coast.
